mapper.insert: insert into ins_class(ins_num, ins_title, ins_des, ins_cate, ins_price, tc_id) values(ins_class_seq.nextval, #{ins_title}, #{ins_des}, #{ins_cate}, #{ins_price}, #{tc_id})
mapper.select: select ins_num, ins_title, ins_des, to_char(ins_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ins_date, ins_cate, ins_vidlist, ins_price, ins_thumbnail, ins_thumbnailsave, tc_id from ins_class where tc_id = #{tc_id} order by ins_num desc
